skill.name: conversion-copywriting
skill.description: Generate conversion-optimized page copy using VOC research, competitor insights, and proven structures. Use when creating or revising landing pages, service pages, or marketing content.
skill.summary: Create high-converting marketing copy backed by customer research and verified claims
skill.author: CleanExpo

security_audit.summary: All static findings are false positives. The skill contains only documentation (SKILL.md) with zero executable code. Detected patterns (hash references, numbered lists) are benign metadata and markdown content.

content.value_statement: Marketing copy often fails because it uses generic language and makes unverifiable claims. This skill generates conversion-optimized page copy that speaks directly to customer pain points using verified VOC research and proven copywriting structures.
actual_capabilities: Generate landing page copy following proven homepage, services, and about page structures
Incorporate voice of customer (VOC) research quotes for authentic customer language
Create verifiable claims backed by business consistency data and public records
Adapt tone and voice to match target audience (conversational, professional, or friendly)
Provide uniqueness scores and verification reports for every generated piece
Replace marketing jargon with clear, customer-centric language
limitations: Does not access external websites or APIs for competitive data
Does not generate images or visual content
Does not publish content directly to platforms
Requires VOC research input for authentic customer voice

use_cases.title: Create High-Converting Landing Pages
use_cases.description: Generate complete homepage or services page copy with hero sections, value propositions, testimonials, and CTAs that follow conversion-optimized structures.

use_cases.title: Rewrite Underperforming Pages
use_cases.description: Revise existing page content to improve conversion rates by replacing jargon with customer language and adding verifiable claims.
use_cases.target_user: Conversion rate optimization specialists, digital marketers

use_cases.title: Generate Marketing Email and Ad Copy
use_cases.description: Create short-form marketing copy for email campaigns, ads, and proposals that maintains brand voice and drives action.

prompt_templates.title: Basic Landing Page Copy
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate homepage copy for a [business type] that serves [target audience]. Key customer pain points: [pain points]. Include: hero headline using VOC language, 3 value propositions, 2 testimonials, 5-step process, and CTA. Tone: [conversational/professional/friendly].
prompt_templates.scenario: Creating a new homepage from scratch

prompt_templates.title: Services Page with VOC Integration
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a services page for [service name]. Use these customer quotes from VOC research: [quotes]. Structure: hero, services overview, deep-dive for top 3 services, process, proof testimonials, CTA. Avoid jargon from the banned list.
prompt_templates.scenario: Building a services page with authentic customer voice

prompt_templates.title: About Page with Credentials
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate an about page. Company story: [story]. Team: [team info]. Values: [values]. Credentials: [licenses/certs]. Verify all credential claims against business data. Tone: [professional/friendly].
prompt_templates.scenario: Creating an authentic about page with verified claims

prompt_templates.title: Conversion Audit and Rewrite
prompt_templates.prompt: Audit this existing copy for conversion issues: [paste copy]. Identify: jargon to remove, weak claims, missing proof elements, unclear CTAs. Rewrite following best practices with 95%+ uniqueness.

output_examples.input: Generate homepage copy for a web design agency serving small businesses. Pain points: expensive pricing, slow turnaround, poor communication.
output_examples.output:
## Hero Headline
Stop Overpaying for Websites That Take Forever

## Problem Statement
You're tired of agencies that quote sky-high prices then disappear for weeks. You need a website that works—without the stress.

## Value Propositions
1. Fixed pricing up front—no hidden fees or scope creep
2. Two-week turnaround on standard sites
3. Direct access to your designer via chat and video calls

## Proof
'They delivered our site in 10 days for half what other agencies quoted.' — Sarah M., Cafe Owner

## Process
1. Discovery call (free)
2. Design proposal with fixed price
3. Your feedback at each stage
4. Launch and training

[Continue with FAQ and CTA]

output_examples.input: Create about page for a plumbing business. Story: started by John after 15 years as an electrician. Values: honesty, quality, respect. Credentials: licensed plumber, fully insured.
output_examples.output:
## Hero
John started plumbing work after 15 years of solving electrical problems in homes. He kept seeing the same issue: quick fixes that created bigger problems later.

## Our Story
We founded this business on a simple idea: do the job right the first time, charge fair prices, and treat every home like it's our own.

## Our Values
- Honest advice—we'll tell you what you need, not what we want to sell
- Quality parts and workmanship
- Respect for your time and property

## Credentials
- Licensed Plumber (#12345)
- Fully Insured
- 15 Years Combined Experience

[Continue with team and CTA]

best_practices: Always provide VOC research quotes to ensure authentic customer voice in generated copy
Verify business facts (credentials, awards, statistics) before including in claims
Replace banned marketing jargon with clear, customer-centric language
anti_patterns: Using generic marketing buzzwords without specific supporting claims
Making credential claims without verifying against business data
Ignoring customer voice in favor of company-focused language

faq.question: What inputs does this skill need to work effectively?
faq.answer: Provide VOC research data (customer quotes), business consistency information (NAP, credentials), and target audience details. More context produces better results.

faq.question: Can this skill generate SEO-optimized content?
faq.answer: Yes, the skill generates meta titles (50-60 chars) and meta descriptions (150-160 chars) as part of the output format.

faq.question: How does the verification process work?
faq.answer: Every output includes a verification report with uniqueness score, verified claims count, and any unverified claim warnings.

faq.question: What tone options are available?
faq.answer: Conversational (default, friendly), Professional (for B2B, legal, medical, finance), and Friendly (for consumer services).

faq.question: Does this skill integrate with other tools?
faq.answer: Yes, it references VOC Research Skill, Competitor Analysis Skill, and Business Consistency Skill for data integration.

faq.question: What output formats are supported?
faq.answer: The skill outputs structured JSON with page type, meta tags, sections array, and verification metrics.
